data_table.description: Form 150 - Hormone Use Update WHI Extension -- in the past year, medications used to treat or prevent osteoporosis, female hormones used or were prescribed, such as estrogen, progesterone, and/or testosterone in the form of pills, patches, shots, creams, etc, and the frequency of their use. Note: The rel# in the file name is used by the submitter to track embargo releases. Files that have "rel2" or later may either contain additional variables or more recent data as compared to the previous rel#.

variable.name: F150VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected

variable.name: OSTPL_X
variable.comment: In the past year, have you used any medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions? Examples are Fosamax, Miacalcin, and Actonel. (Do not include use of female hormones or selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMS), such as raloxifene (Evista), which are covered in Question 2.)

variable.name: OSTALND_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Alendronate (Fosamax) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: OSTCALC_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Calcitonin (Miacalcin) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: OSTRISED_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Residronate (Actonel) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: OSTPAMID_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Pamidronate (Aredia) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: OSTZOLEN_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Zolendronate (Zometa) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: OSTPTH_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Parathyroid hormone (PTH, Forteo) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: OSTOTHER_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Other Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: OSTDNTK_X
variable.comment: In the past year, which medications that you get with a doctor's prescription to treat or prevent osteoporosis or other bone conditions did you use? (Mark all that apply): Don't know Sub-question of F150 V9 Q1 'Used prescription osteoporosis meds'

variable.name: SRM_X
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMS)? (these may be prescribed to prevent osteoporosis and breast cancer and are sometimes called 'designer estrogens'. Examples are raloxifene [Evista] and tamoxifen [Nolvadex].)

variable.name: SRMEVST_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what SERMS did you take? (Mark all that apply.): Raloxifene (Evista) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q2 'Used SERMs'

variable.name: SRMNOLV_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what SERMS did you take? (Mark all that apply.): Tamoxifen (Nolvadex) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q2 'Used SERMs'

variable.name: SRMOTHR_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what SERMS did you take? (Mark all that apply.): Other Sub-question of F150 V9 Q2 'Used SERMs'

variable.name: SRMDNTK_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what SERMs did you take? (Mark all that apply.): Don't know Sub-question of F150 V9 Q2 'Used SERMs'

variable.name: NATHOR_X
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any 'natural' hormones that you can get without a doctor's prescription? These are usually made from plants or herbs and often obtained from health food stores or by mail order. They may be in the form of a pill, vaginal cream or suppository, skin cream, or soy-enriched foods.

variable.name: YAMCRM_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Wild yam cream Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: YAMPLS_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Wild yam pills Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: PRGCRM_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Progesterone cream Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: PRGSUP_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Progesterone suppositories Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: DHEAPL_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): DHEA pills (dehyroepiandrosterone) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: PHYPLS_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Phytoestrogen pills or powder (soy or flax) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: PHYCRM_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Phytoestrogen creams (soy or flax) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: PHYFDS_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Phytoestrogen-enriched foods (tofu, soybeans) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: NTOTHR_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Other Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: NTDNTK_X
variable.comment: In the past year, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? (Do not include hormone preparations that need a doctor's prescription.) (Mark all that apply.): Don't know Sub-question of F150 V9 Q3 'Used non-prescription natural hormones'

variable.name: HRPST1YR_X
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any female hormones (ESTROGEN or PROGESTERONE [also called PROGESTIN]) that were prescribed by a doctor? (These may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shot, cream, vaginal ring or suppository, or bio-identical compound.)

variable.name: HRSYMPT_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - To treat symptoms
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): To treat symptoms Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRLOOKB_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - To look better
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): To look better Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRFEELB_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - To feel better
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): To feel better Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HROSTPR_X
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): To treat or prevent osteoporosis Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRDIS_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - For other diseases
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): To treat or prevent other diseases Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRFAMAD_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - Advice from family
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): Advice from family or friend Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRHCPAD_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - Health care provider advice
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): Advice from health care provider Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRINTRN_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - Info on Internet
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): Information on the Internet (World Wide Web) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRTEST_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - Results from test
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): Results from saliva, urine, or blood test Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HRMEDIA_X
variable.description: Estrogen or Progesterone - Info in media
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): Information in the media (for example, newspaper, magazine, or television) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: HROTH_X
variable.comment: What were your reasons for taking this hormone (Estrogen or Progesterone) prescription? (Mark all that apply.): Other reason Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: EPPLPA_X
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormones PILLS or PATCHES prescribed by a doctor containing both ESTROGEN and PROGESTERONE (PROGESTIN) COMBINED in the same pill, patch, package (for example, Prempro, Premphase), vaginal ring, or bio-identical compound? (Do not include the use of two separate estrogen or progesterone pills taken at the same time.) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: EPPL_X
variable.comment:
Did you use an Estrogen and Progesterone pill combination? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5 'Used prescription Estrogen+Progesterone'

variable.name: EPPLDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the Estrogen and Progesterone pill combination? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5 'Used prescription Estrogen+Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5.1 ' Used Estrogen+Progesterone pill combination'

variable.name: EPPA_X
variable.comment:
Did you use an Estrogen and Progesterone patch combination? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5 'Used prescription Estrogen+Progesterone'

variable.name: EPPADUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the Estrogen and Progesterone patch combination? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'_x000D_
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5 'Used prescription Estrogen+Progesterone'_x000D_
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5.2 ' Used Estrogen+Progesterone patch combination'

variable.name: EPOTH_X
variable.comment:
Did you use some other Estrogen and Progesterone combination that was not a pill or patch? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5 'Used prescription Estrogen+Progesterone'

variable.name: EPOTHDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the other (not pill or patch) Estrogen and Progesterone combination? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5 'Used prescription Estrogen+Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q5.3 ' Used Estrogen+Progesterone other combination'

variable.name: ETPL_X
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor containing both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE COMBINED in the same pill (for example, Estratest)? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: ETDUR_X
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone pills containing both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q6 'Used prescription Estrogen+Testosterone pills'

variable.name: ETTYPE_X
variable.description: Type of Estrogen+Testosterone pills used longest
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of COMBINED ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE pills did you use longest? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q6 'Used prescription Estrogen+Testosterone pills'

variable.name: E_X
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any ESTROGEN that was prescribed by a doctor (other than the combinations described in Questions 5 and 6)? (These may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shot, skin cream, bio-identical compound, or vaginal cream, ring, tablet, or suppository.) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: EPL_X
variable.comment:
Did you use an oral estrogen pill that you take by mouth? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'

variable.name: EPLDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the oral estrogen pills? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7.1 'Used oral Estrogen pill'

variable.name: EPLTYPE_X
variable.description: Kind of Oral Estrogen pills taken
variable.comment:
What kind of oral estrogen pills did you take? (Mark the one used the longest if you used more than one kind.) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7.1 'Used oral Estrogen pill'

variable.name: EPCH_X
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen skin patch? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'

variable.name: EPCHDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the estrogen skin patch? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7.2 'Used Estrogen skin patch'

variable.name: ECRM_X
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen skin cream? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'

variable.name: ECRMDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the estrogen skin cream? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7.3 'Used Estrogen skin cream'

variable.name: ESHT_X
variable.comment:
Did you have estrogen shots? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'

variable.name: ESHTDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have the estrogen shots? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7.4 'Had Estrogen shots'

variable.name: EVAG_X
variable.description: Used Estrogen vaginal cream, ring, capsule
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen vaginal cream, ring, capsule, or suppository? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'

variable.name: EVAGDUR_X
variable.description: Months used vaginal forms of Estrogen
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use any of these vaginal forms of estrogen: cream, ring, capsule, suppository? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7 'Used prescription Estrogen'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q7.5 'Used Estrogen vaginal cream, ring, capsule'

variable.name: P_X
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any PROGESTERONE OR PROGESTIN that was prescribed by a doctor (other than the combinations described in Question 5)? (These may have been in the form of a pill, skin cream, shot, vaginal cream, vaginal capsule or suppository, IUD [intra-uterine device], or bio-identical compound.) Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'

variable.name: PPL_X
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin pill? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'

variable.name: PPLDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the progesterone or progestin pill? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8.1 'Used Progesterone pill'

variable.name: PPLTYPE_X
variable.comment:
What kind of progesterone or progestin pill did you take? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8.1 'Used Progesterone pill'

variable.name: PPLDAY_X
variable.description: Days per month used Progesterone pill
variable.comment:
How many days per month did you use a progesterone or progestin pill? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8.1 'Used Progesterone pill'

variable.name: PCRM_X
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin skin cream? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'

variable.name: PCRMDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the progesterone or progestin skin cream? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8.3 'Used Progesterone skin cream'

variable.name: PSHT_X
variable.comment:
Did you have progesterone or progestin shots? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'

variable.name: PSHTDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have progesterone or progestin shots? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8.3 'Had Progesterone shots'

variable.name: PVAG_X
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin vaginal cream or vaginal capsule? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'

variable.name: PVAGDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the progesterone or progestin vaginal cream or vaginal capsule? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8.4 'Used Progesterone vaginal cream'

variable.name: PIUD_X
variable.comment:
Did you use an intrauterine progestin device (IUD)? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'

variable.name: PIUDDUR_X
variable.comment:
For how many moths did you use the progestin IUD? Sub-question of F150 V9 Q4 'Used prescription Estrogen or Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8 'Used prescription Progesterone'
Sub-question of F150 V9 Q8.5 'Used intrauterine Progestin device'

variable.name: EST_X
variable.comment: Computed from form 150 questions 4, 5, 6, 7, 7.1, and 7.2

variable.name: PRG_X
variable.comment: Computed from form 150 questions 4, 5, 8, and 8.1

variable.name: HRT_X
variable.description: Hormone use last year (estrogen or progesterone)
variable.comment: Computed from variables 'Estrogen use last year' and 'Progesterone use last year'.
